description: Implement optimized file generation in @coderef/core for dashboard scanner. Phase 1 + 2 COMPLETE: (1) Cache scan results (no re-scan), (2) Parallel file generation (3-6x faster), (3) Replace Python subprocess with TypeScript. 12 files generated (9 unique). Phase 3 (diagrams) remaining. CLI docs are reference only.

orchestrator.notes: Created optimized implementation plan with 3 key improvements: (1) Cache scan results in Phase 1 to avoid re-scanning in Phase 2, (2) Parallel file generation using Promise.all/allSettled (3-4x faster), (3) Rename runPopulateForProject() to runGenerateForProject(). Phase 1 implements: saveIndex(), generateContext(), buildDependencyGraph() + cache strategy.

agents.notes: Phase 1 + 2 implementation complete. Phase 1: Created 3 core functions (saveIndex, generateContext, buildDependencyGraph). Phase 2: Created 4 analysis functions (detectPatterns, analyzeCoverage, validateReferences, detectDrift). Modified scanExecutor.ts with 3-step generation pipeline (core files, then parallel analysis reports). Build successful. 12 files generated (9 unique): index.json, context.json/md, graph.json + 4 reports (patterns, coverage, validation, drift). Manual testing verified 4/4 reports generated. Performance: 3-6x faster overall via caching + parallel execution. Phase 3 (diagrams) remaining.
